title: Berkeley Ventures, Berkeley Values Pitch Competition
description:
The Berkeley Startup Cluster launched the [Berkeley Ventures, Berkeley Values Learning Lab and Pitch Competition](https://www.linkedin.com/company/bv2-learning-lab/about/) to cultivate and showcase Berkeley innovators' ideas, workplace initiatives, and products geared towards diversity, equity & inclusion (DEI). Through 1-1 coaching sessions and group training workshops, the event series has supported 14 Berkeley startups and innovation businesses.

Join the Berkeley Startup Cluster for a series of Shark Tank-style pitches & cast your vote for the Audience Choice award!

**[Register to attend the BV2 Pitch Competition](https://www.eventbrite.com/e/pitch-for-equity-berkeley-innovators-ideas-and-initiatives-for-inclusion-tickets-154868898043)**

**Wednesday, June 23, 4 - 5:30pm PT**
